title: Building the Next Wave of AI & Automation Talent
subtitle: About AIDT&D
description: AIDT&D (AI, Digital Transformation & Development) is a studio and training space where modern AI agents, RPA automations, and real-world projects meet structured learning and mentoring.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make AI and automation skills truly accessible by combining hands-on projects, mentorship, and real client work so that learners don't just collect certificates – they become confident builders.
mission.details: We want every learner who passes through AIDT&D to ship something real: an agent, a bot, a workflow, or a tool that actually solves a problem for someone.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become a go-to hub where companies and individuals co-build the future of work with AI – a place where ideas move from "what if" to deployed systems, and where talent is constantly being discovered, trained, and empowered.
vision.details: We imagine a world where every team has access to practical AI and automation expertise, and every motivated learner can grow into that role with the right guidance and projects.

story.heading: Our Story
paragraphs: AIDT&D was born from a simple observation: there is a huge gap between what most courses teach and what teams actually need when they want to ship AI or automation into production.

On one side, we saw students and professionals stuck in endless theory and tool-checklists. On the other side, we saw organisations struggling to find people who can design, build, and maintain AI agents, RPA workflows, and document understanding solutions on real infrastructure.
AIDT&D exists to sit in the middle – as a studio that ships real solutions and a training ecosystem that prepares people to work on those solutions from day one.

highlights.title: Project-first:

highlights.title: Talent pipeline:
highlights.description: Interns and learners can grow into contributors on live projects.

services.title: Training Programs
services.description: We run focused programs on AI agents, RPA, and full stack automation – with labs, assignments, and mentor feedback.
features: Capstone projects inspired by real client work

services.title: Internships & Co-build
services.description: We invite learners to collaborate on live or simulated projects, acting as a bridge between training and industry.
features: Co-build model: we ship together with your team

values.heading: How We Think & Work
paragraphs: Great AI and automation work is not just about tools – it's about understanding context, asking the right questions, and designing systems that people can actually use and maintain.
That's why we emphasise fundamentals, design thinking, and collaboration alongside hands-on exposure to platforms like OpenAI, LangChain, Automation Anywhere, and ABBYY.
Whether you're a learner or an organisation, our goal is the same: ship something meaningful, and ensure you understand how it works under the hood.

coreValues.title: Real over theoretical:
coreValues.description: If it doesn't ship or create value, it's only half done.

coreValues.title: Learn by doing:

coreValues.title: Clarity over hype:

coreValues.title: Shared growth:
coreValues.description: When our learners succeed, our partner companies succeed – everyone grows together.
